website_summaries.verdict: Tremendous control and flexibility for home baristas, from one of the top names.
pros: Looks great and has everything you need for variety and consistency
Adjustable milk frother produces variable foam
Dishwasher safe tray and grounds container
cons: Instructions are a little fussy, but need to be followed carefully

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. So fast and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. So fast and easy to use. If something happen or missing the machine will flash a light so just need to check and do whatever it's need it. Capuchino never been so easy to do. I'm work in a bar and do a lot of coffees and this machine it's by far the easiest i ever use to have the perfect foam. Also really good that it clean itself everytime you turn on and off. No need it a lot of space and it's really discreet
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Excellent base-model bean-to-cup coffee machine
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because our old one, same model, was showing signs of needing some "major"-ish attention. We've had it 9 years and use it 10 times a day at least, so very good to have lasted so long. If you want a bean-to-cup coffee machine that basically just makes espresso and has a steam wand, then this is the machine for you. This later version of the model has an ECO setting, on by default, but otherwise is just the same as the old version. Would thoroughly recommend this machine to anyone, does the job well and is damned good value too.
customer_reviews.author: Mojo

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of o rings falling off
customer_reviews.text: Be careful when removing both shields on frothier, there are 2 o rings and when I removed 2nd shield the o ring must have came off, when this happens you will discover it will not froth as air escapes once I got new o rings it sorted it , got pack of 20 o rings for £4 on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: angusmedic999

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant device, great coffee
customer_reviews.text: The best thing I purchased last year hence left this review. Exceptional device. Thank God I got it before the COVID outbreak, I used it occasionally before as I always visited the coffee shops but now i can make a Latte as good as a coffee shop at home.
customer_reviews.author: S. E. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Has stopped working correctly within a week.
customer_reviews.text: Had it less than a week. No problems until today when it started delivering very weak coffee & the single shot has stopped working, it pours a full cup unless we press the button to stop it. No help in the instruction manual for this problem. Was bought as a birthday present for husband, we’re very disappointed. Haven’t contacted customer service yet to see if they can resolve it but the shine has gone off the purchase anyway. It’s obviously a faulty machine.
customer_reviews.author: Moira simpson

customer_reviews.title: Greaaattttt
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine. Grinds perfectly with different settings. Makes a lovely coffee . If I could change one thing I would make the water tank bigger but it's easy to refill and keep the coffee flowing
customer_reviews.author: brimmy1

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Makes a good espresso, or cappuccino. I replaced my 10 year old bean to cup machine and this is much cleaner, easier to use, and makes a better coffee. I believe it makes coffee up to the standard of the coffees from the large industrial machines, which my last one did not.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee machine
customer_reviews.text: My second coffee machine of the same model. The first broke (my fault) was bought from John Lewis. Love the ease of this thing and the coffee it makes. The only downside to ordering this new one was it came with a European plug.
customer_reviews.author: Sherwood

customer_reviews.title: Good machine
customer_reviews.text: A good machine and a big improvement on my previous De Longhi. The item is easier to clean and also fairly simple to set up. The grouts are noticeably wetter than those from the earlier Magnifica and I have not yet figured out why. Now, if the company can produce an affordable coffee machine that allows a user to add water and beans without dismantling anything (as my old Gaggia Synchrony could), I would give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: GSP

customer_reviews.title: Better than any coffee shop
customer_reviews.text: Reviews don't do this justice, my father has the Gaggia (if that's how you spell it) version, and this is far superior. Perfect coffee, perfect crema every time, frother works well, so easy compared to older machines that took ages to clean, this basically cleans itself.
customer_reviews.author: John Nottingham

customer_reviews.title: so east to make a professional cup of coffee
customer_reviews.text: Having had a previous experience of home coffee machines we were a little trepidaceous about this one. But our fears were unfounded as it is easy to use with simple one touch procedures, We were making americanos and cappucinos in no time at all. One thing don't load ground coffee into the hopper until after the machine hsas settled down after switching on
customer_reviews.author: tomp10

customer_reviews.title: Awesome machine - we love it
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best purchase we’ve made in years both my wife and I are Costa lovers and were missing our coffee fix in lockdown- on recommendation from a friend we bought the Delonghi and wow - it makes coffee and got chocolates easily as good as Costa but at a fraction of the price - easy to set up - easy to use - easy to clean - we absolutely love it :-)
customer_reviews.author: Millie Bowker

customer_reviews.title: Big improvement on pod machines in flavour and cost.
customer_reviews.text: Purchase as replacement for same 9 year old model very pleased and recommended purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David glossop

customer_reviews.title: Super good
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee machine! I had a nesspresso before and cant compare, this one taste like a proper cafeteria! I little bigger than expected but the taste and quality of the coffee is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: pablo de la pena

customer_reviews.title: Excellent... But far from silent!
customer_reviews.text: So... I have used a similar machine before so was confident the coffee would be great. BUT I was seduced by the promise of a silent grinder - don’t be. Grinder is a LONG way from silent, so not convinced it’s worth the xtra £££ compared with the regular Magnifica. That said the coffee is very VERY good!
customer_reviews.author: Ian P Leighton

customer_reviews.title: Can't recommend enough! Buy one!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this coffee machine. My brother had one of the more expensive models that also had a tank for milk etc, however I didn't really need that so decided on this model. We are so impressed with the quality of these DeLonghi machines, they are easy to use and maintain and make great coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bean to Cup machine, highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Far better than the berg bean to cup machine that my new De’Longhi Magnifica has replaced. My old machine cost more than double the new machine, and was messy, leaky, and difficult to clean. There are plenty of great features in the new Magnifica that show the design has been very carefully thought out to make the coffee machine easy and a pleasure to use. Coffee tastes great too.
customer_reviews.author: OFA

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant machine. An update from our previous one that served us well for many years. Very happy. Easy to use and makes wonderful coffee
customer_reviews.author: sumipa

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy to make delicious coffee
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for my previous Magnifica - and it's a much better unit. Much quieter, and hotter coffee. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with automatic coffee machine and very easy to use I really recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had a tassimo previously but not missed it at all ...
customer_reviews.text: Had a tassimo previously but not missed it at all. This makes a lovely cup of coffee that you would compare to costa. Works out cheaper in the long run using beans. If you can afford it it is definitely worth the expense.
customer_reviews.author: colin taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love coffee
customer_reviews.text: This coffee machine is great, easy to use and once you know what you are doing easy to clean, it makes great coffee and the coffee is easy to make which I love
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as previous model.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed this was to replace an older machine. Shots were inconsistent frothed not as good as our older machine, descale light came on after only 30 coffees. Sadly sent it back for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and tasty coffee
customer_reviews.text: I’m using it for a couple of months, all I can say that it’s doing the job perfectly. Very happy with this machine :)
customer_reviews.author: Andrei Dinu

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfactory service from Uniquedealls
customer_reviews.text: Coffee machine came with a European plug which was delivered to a UK address and despite several emails to both the seller (Uniquedealls) and Amazon neither would resolve the issue. Very disappointed with customer service
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes superb espresso
customer_reviews.text: Great machine making excellent coffee. Bought for my son who is a quality espresso fan and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: D A J

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but makes a great coffee
customer_reviews.text: A great coffee machine, it takes a bit of time to adjust it to your personal taste but it makes good coffee. A little expensive and still early days but overall pleased with product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: one the best coffee machine i had for a long time
customer_reviews.text: one the best coffee machine i had for a long time. what make this coffee machine is of choice making coffee. Make a perfect coffee Fanastic product
customer_reviews.author: garry

customer_reviews.title: I have drunk more coffee since having this fantastic machine. It does everything but drinks it for ...
customer_reviews.text: I have drunk more coffee since having this fantastic machine.It does everything but drinks it for you.I would recomend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: g g biggin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this coffee machine. So easy to use, easy to clean and produces a fine cup of coffee that you can tailor to your taste!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs S Scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant bit of kit. Arrived sooner than quoted delivery date. Delivers nice hot coffee time after time...
customer_reviews.author: Mr G

customer_reviews.title: just the job
customer_reviews.text: This was an exact replacement for a much used and liked machine, so I obviously liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. H.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Good product but de calcification process does not seem to work
customer_reviews.author: Craig Manning

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: Just inboxed it, European plug so bought a converter and machine doesn’t power up - very poor considering the cost
customer_reviews.author: J C Nicholls

customer_reviews.title: An easy to use machine
customer_reviews.text: Liked how easy it is to make a delicious cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Noble

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is the best coffee machine I've ever had hands down
customer_reviews.author: philip

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after less than 100 coffees
customer_reviews.text: Must have made less than 100 coffees and it’s stopped working. Not good quality
customer_reviews.author: Oli

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant machine
customer_reviews.text: Great machine , only drawback is the water tank is a bit small
customer_reviews.author: DIANE GLADSTONE

customer_reviews.title: Better and cheaper in the long run then a Pod mechine!
customer_reviews.text: So far there is no cons just pro's! It looks good and does everything it says it does so for the value compared to all the others its worth getting!
customer_reviews.author: Hakan Faik

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant for the money
customer_reviews.text: water tank a bit small but a great machine overall
customer_reviews.author: Mr Ian C P Twitchen

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic product and does what it says it does and easy to use. Makes a perfect cup of Espresso or Cappuccino. I highly recommend this product and gave it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Christo

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee machine
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine! Makes a lovely cup of coffee and so easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: lif5gat

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine! Makes great coffee and you still get to add your own personal touch with all the settings available.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Sean P F Davey

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee Maker
customer_reviews.text: Excellent in office setting for making coffee by the cup
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee maker, been using regularly with no problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delighted with this model which fulfilled expectations. Excellent package and delivery. Well pleased with purchase and coffee production.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coffee just gets better !
customer_reviews.text: Cannot fault this bean to cup machine , after 6-8 cups coffee just gets better and better. May take a few goes to get grind to strength correct , had a tassimo machine before this and there is no comparison ,so if you like fresh coffee and have a few bucks to spare go for it !
customer_reviews.author: scott elder

customer_reviews.title: Good results!!
customer_reviews.text: Having researched similar models on the market I selected this model as being best suited for my needs and am pleased with the result. I always drink expresso and after a few experiments and careful selection of beans, (although you can also use ground coffee too),I am getting very good results, almost as good as coffee dispensed from the best commercial outlets and restaurants, so I am very pleased. It remains to be seen if the machine continues to give good results and I have extended the warranty to 3 years, which is available from Amazon in France but not the UK, so I am optimistic for the future!
customer_reviews.author: Francophone.db

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing doesn't worth the money if you like strong espresso
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing doesn't worth the money if you like strong espresso. If I knew it was so poor the quality of the espresso made by this machine I would had bought a Krups which is a bean to coffee equivalent and it does a great coffee compared to this one.
customer_reviews.author: miguelbarata

customer_reviews.title: Look for a Delonghi but the smaller version is much better.
customer_reviews.text: I would not reccomend this Machine. Look for a Delonghi but the smaller version is much better.
customer_reviews.author: B M Moisa

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a present for someone else so I have not used it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: GREAT MACHINE
customer_reviews.text: This is our second De'Longhi coffee machine but our first bean to cup one and what a difference! We are really impressed with this machine as it is clean, simple to use and produces a gorgeous cup of coffee in seconds. It took us a while to find the coffee beans that suited our taste but it was worth the experimenting. This machine is excellent value for money and we would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S P Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Search over - Buy this machine!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used many Bean to cup coffee machines in shared workspaces and the quality has varied wildly, so I was careful to do the research before buying. Overall, it’s a fantastic machine that dispenses coffee of better quality than any of the large chains and on a par with the best independent coffee shops. You could of course spend a few hundred more on a Sage but I doubt you’d see much of a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Antony Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use great tasting coffee
customer_reviews.text: This machine makes great coffee at the touch of a couple of buttons. I have just mastered the frother which was a doddle. I can't fault it as yet except for trying to register it with Delonghi. Gave up in the end. Took up insurance with Amazon anyway. Perfect cup of coffee with a fuller cup than other machines. It can also be used with g.packet ground coffee though I prefer beans.
customer_reviews.author: creamkate

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee, smart machine.
customer_reviews.text: I love coffee, I will grab an instant, or a pod, but wanted to get at least a couple of cups of real coffee per day. I have a kettle by de longhi, and it's perfect, so thought I would try this bean to cup machine, glad I picked this one, simple to use, easy to fill beans and water. Easy to clean. What more could I want?RReally happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Demelzazz

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee-machine!
customer_reviews.text: My better half is really happy with her birthday present! We both love the small shots and long cappuccino it produces. Might be a bit expensive in maintenance (due to frequent de-scaling needed - once in a month or so, but this depends on your tap water hardness). Anyway I highly recommend it for the coffee drink quality at the price!
customer_reviews.author: Andy B

customer_reviews.title: Although it is claimed that  the machine has been delivered into my hands, this is not the case
customer_reviews.text: I shall be able to provide a review of the machine if and when it is delivered. I find it astonishing that it is claimed that the machine was delivered into our hands yesterday 9th August when this is patently not the case.
customer_reviews.author: John N. Turnbull

customer_reviews.title: Good value. Produces a great coffee
customer_reviews.text: Our previous delonghi gave up after years of heavy use. The same machine wasn’t available, but this one has filled the gap well. Produces a fab Bean to cup coffee. Only criticism, the machines descale procedure is No longer as intuitive as there is not a display and it you have to follow the lights on the various buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne miller

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine - use it all the time (at least twice a day). It's now a year and a half since I bought it. My only reason for marking it down slightly is because of the stupid plug, which I've had to change to a proper English one, as it kept cutting out. I mostly use it for black coffees, but have made a couple of cappuccinos for friends.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Excellent coffee, depends on bean quality and degree of roasts used
customer_reviews.text: Produces excellent coffee. The milk frother works well. The capacity of the water tank could be higher to reduce repetitive refilling, this is being very ''picky" however. Can only recommend this machine.
customer_reviews.author: AndrewP

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: Really recommended. Great bean to cup coffee machine. Its worth also purchasing the water filters as these really make a difference to the taste in a hard water area.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Good upgrade from previous model
customer_reviews.text: I love it BUT check UK plug I have had to buy an adapter which Amazon kindly paid for. Super upgrade from my older model & design tweaked sensibly
customer_reviews.author: JMH

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, pretty compact machine
customer_reviews.text: Love our coffee machine. First time owning one so have no comparisons. Racing through our coffee beans as its so popular with all the family. Takes a bit of time to get used to it but definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kirstin Everett

customer_reviews.title: The fact it grinds beans and is able to adjust the strength
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my son -he’s absolutely delighted with it It provides a treat every morning !
customer_reviews.author: Tommo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent coffee machine
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a delonghi coffee machine that I had for 6 years. It is excellent. The only complaint that I had initially was that it did not have a UK plug on it, but when I told the supplier they sent me an adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: fantastic coffee machine
customer_reviews.text: fantastic coffee machine, so good , well worth the money great coffee easy to clean what more could you ask for.
customer_reviews.author: paul bartram

customer_reviews.title: it makes great coffee and works excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have this coffee machine for 4 years now, it makes great coffee and works excellent, only down point is that its does need filter to change and descale say about every 2-3 month which are quite expensive.
customer_reviews.author: lela

customer_reviews.title: it is still new so we'll wait and see but very easy to use and makes brilliant coffee
customer_reviews.text: this was a present for my mrs works a treat no issues yet .. it is still new so we'll wait and see but very easy to use and makes brilliant coffee. mrs is a proper coffee lover :-)
customer_reviews.author: Shvan

customer_reviews.title: Very good item
customer_reviews.text: Makes very nice coffee. Easy to use and time saving. Value for money
customer_reviews.author: George C.

customer_reviews.title: Great machine :)
customer_reviews.text: Really pro equipment. At the beginning my wife was disappointed about coffe taste but after 5-6 cups (as it's mentioned in the manual) finally I have lovely tasting coffee!!!! Well recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Hubby

customer_reviews.title: Happiness
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my purchase. Just the thing for making coffee with my favorite beans.
customer_reviews.author: VERONICA lOMAS

customer_reviews.title: A good decision to buy.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased so far and makes splendid coffee. Early days and still working out some aspects but overall easy to use and a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: pg

customer_reviews.title: but now I love it.
customer_reviews.text: It took me a little while getting used to it especially frothing the milk, but now I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous coffee!  You can taste the crisp freshness straight from the bean
customer_reviews.text: We have previously used espresso makers using ground coffee, but I'm afraid there is no turning back now. If you can stretch to the extra expense - treat yourself - even if you only have one coffee in the morning, it's worth the luxury of a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set to your personal choice of coffee strength ...
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous machine. Easy to set to your personal choice of coffee strength and fill levels. Gives superb ground coffee flavour and the milk steamer works brilliantly. Will save a fortune on visits to the coffee shop.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline A. Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this .
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time buying/using a bean to cup machine and I love it! It is so easy to use and simple to clean. The coffee tastes amazing. I'm so happy with it. Looks very smart too. Very good price too.
customer_reviews.author: alison stoneman

customer_reviews.title: best espresso  maker
customer_reviews.text: Very good espresso machine being Italian I like original espresso and this Delonghi makes an original espresso coffee strong and creamy Do recommend you will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: starlite

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Makes good coffee. We've had de'longhi machines in past, and this one has had a few improvements to older model. Only new, but so far, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Coffee Machine
customer_reviews.text: this machine simply makes the best coffee you could wish for at home. easy to use you can adjust it very easily to your own taste.i love the fact you can run a quck cycle that warms the machine up so your coffee is nice and hot and you can adjust the amount of coffee it dispenses to take into account different cup sizes. like other customers mentioned you need to run about 6-8 test runs to get it right for your own taste- but it well worth the effort .the machine is a quality piece of kit and well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: john wakefield

product_meta.title: Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine with an adjustable grinder, manual cappuccino maker, for brewing espresso, cappuccino, latte. ECAM22110B MagnificaS
product_meta.description: A great choice for the coffee aficionado who is looking for convenience. ❗Related Voltage/Frequency (V~Hz): ⚡220-240~50/60. A power adapter is included (8.2x6.5x3.8 inches) in order to work in the United States❗. DeLonghi ECAM22110B MagnificaS coffee machine has a filter so you won’t have to descale your machine often. The 13-setting conical burr grinder is sufficient for the overwhelming majority of coffee drinkers, and it gives you plenty of room to customize your brew. The bean hopper holds about a half pound of grounds, allowing you to create at least 12 double shots or 25 single espresso shots. This model also features a bypass doser that allows you to use pre-ground coffee, which is great if you’re working through your stash of store-bought grounds, or if you’re just looking for a quick cup of something in the evenings and don’t want to take extra time. It also has a telescoping spigot that allows you to modify its position based on the cup size you’re using. There are four user profiles, with each profile having the ability to save their preferred settings for every drink. The milk frothing with a dial-based controller, allowing you to adjust the foam! Control just about every aspect of your. Intelligent feature Empty water and bean container indicator Coffee-grounds container capacity indicator Programmable automatic switch-on and stand-by Cleaning warning for cappuccino system Rinse and decalcification auto-programs Programming the water hardness level Parts and Components Cappuccino device Removable brewing unit with a variable capacity Removable water reservoir with an overall capacity of 47 Oz Water filter Removable drip tray with water level indicator Manufactured in Europe
feature_bullets: MULTIFUNCTIONAL automatic espresso coffee machine with a maual CAPPUCCINO system that delivers a tasty barista-quality Espresso, Long Coffee, Double Espresso, Cappuccino, than 3 minutes. Can be used with either coffee beans or ground coffee for preparation of two cups of coffee within a single brewing cycle.

PROFESSIONAL Brew two cups of magic drink simultaneously with Top-of-the-line Delonghi bean-to-cup brews two cups. Great brewing without having to learn how to be a barista. This fully automated machine has an integrated silent coffee grinder with 13 adjustable grinding settings, a bypass doser, a pump generating up to 15 bars of pressure, a water filter,an manual milk frother, as electronic temperature control and pre-brewing technology.

USER FRIENDLY. A super-automatic espresso maker can deliver the coffee shop experience to the comfort of your home, any time you feel the urge. System equipped with control panel with icons,the Cappuccino System device, a front-loading water tank, a bean hopper & coffee-grounds container with a capacity indicator and also provides adjustable water & coffee drink quantity.
EASY TO CLEAN All removable components of the Delonghi super-automatic espresso coffee machine are dishwasher safe.

WORRY-FREE PURCHASE: Delonghi super-automatic coffee machine backed with an Unconditional Satisfaction Guarantee and a 12-month Warranty. If you are not 100% satisfied, please CONTACT US immediately and we will help you right away. Our world-class customer support is available 7 days per week.
